meanings.sent1: The topic was researchable, so the students easily found information for their project.
meanings.sent2: The library had many researchable books on various subjects.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog was not researchable, but it sure made for a funny cartoon.

meanings.sent1: The mysterious case was highly researchable, keeping the detective busy for weeks.

meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like researchable mirrors, reflecting every emotion she tried to hide.
